content: विकेश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (शी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Having loose hair. {@--2@} Having no hair, bald (as head). --शी {@--1@} A woman with loose hair. {@--2@} A woman without hair. {@--3@} A small tress of hair tied up separately and then collected into the larger braid or {%Veṇi%}. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of Śiva in the form of the Earth (one of the 8 forms of Śiva; <ab>cf.</ab> यामाहुः सर्वभूतप्रकृतिः <ls>Ś. 1. 1.</ls>).
